# üöÄ DevStudio v1.1.1 - What's New


**Release Date:** December 11, 2024

---

## ‚ú® New Features

### üìù **Request Resources System**
Now you can request new content to be added to DevStudio:
- Request AI Tools you want to see in the app
- Suggest YouTube Channels for Learning Hub
- Request Playlists for specific topics
- Ask for videos on topics you want to learn
- Suggest learning materials, books, or docs

### üìã **Track Your Requests**
Keep track of everything you've requested:
- View all your submitted requests in one place
- See status: Pending, Approved, or Rejected
- Filter by status to find what you're looking for
- Filter by type (AI Tools, Channels, Playlists, etc.)
- Tap any request to see full details
- Beautiful color-coded cards for each type

### üé® **Beautiful Design**
Each request type has its own unique look:
- AI Tools - Purple gradient with sparkle icon
- Channels - Red gradient with video library icon
- Playlists - Orange gradient with playlist icon
- Topic Videos - Purple gradient with topic icon
- Materials - Green gradient with book icon

---

## üé® Design Updates

- Colorful gradient cards for each request type
- Status badges with icons (Pending/Approved/Rejected)
- Clean filter chips for easy sorting
- Beautiful success dialogs after submitting
- Smooth animations throughout
- Modern, professional look

---

## üêõ Fixes

- Icons now load properly from cloud storage
- Removed unnecessary settings options
- Cleaned up debug messages
- Better form validation
- Improved request submission
- Faster history loading

---

## üôè Thank You!

We're constantly improving DevStudio based on your feedback. Now you can directly request features and content you want to see!

**Enjoy the new features!** üéâ
